util./ping: Get the latency of the bot.

tournament./tournament create (name) (datetime) (ma: Create a tournament called (name) that starts at (dateime) written in ISO 8601 and is optionally described as [description].
tournament./tournament remove: Remove the tournament of the channel the command is used in.
tournament./tournament winner (player): Declare (player) as winning their match in a round.

card./card deck (hash): Create an image of the deck, (hash) is the exported deck hash
card./card hermit (hermit) [rarity]: Get information about a (hermit)'s card, optionally only of rarity [rarity].
